Title: Relates to periods of reincarceration for absconding and certain technical violations by releasees
Summary: Relates to increasing possible periods of reincarceration for absconding and the consideration via judicial discretion of reincarceration and possible periods of reincarceration for certain technical violations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to possible periods of reincarceration for absconding and certain technical violations by releasees
